title: Deals: Samsung Galaxy S22 series all-time lows, first ASUS Chromebook Flip CX5 discount, more
content:
All of today’s best deals are headlined by new all-time lows on Samsung’s latest Galaxy S22 series handsets at up to $250 off. That’s alongside the first discount on the new ASUS Chromebook Flip CX5 and Jabra’s Elite 4 ANC Google Fast Pair Earbuds at $86. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: Samsung Galaxy S22 series all-time lows, first ASUS Chromebook Flip CX5 discount, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Samsung's latest Galaxy S22 series handsets are now down to new all-time low at up to $250 off to go alongside today's other best deals.
